description: This file provides security utilities for a backend service, including password hashing and verification with bcrypt, as well as JWT token creation and decoding. It defines several public functions to handle these security-related tasks, utilizing external libraries and project configuration.

methods.name: str hash_password(plain_password: str)
methods.description: Hashes a plaintext password using bcrypt.

methods.name: bool verify_password(plain_password: str, password_hash: str)
methods.description: Verifies a plaintext password against a bcrypt hash.

methods.name: str create_access_token(subject: str, expires_delta: Optional[timedelta] = None, extra_claims: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None)
methods.description: Creates a signed JWT access token with optional expiration and extra claims.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] decode_token(token: str)
methods.description: Decodes and validates a JWT token, returning its payload claims.

ctags.name: create_access_token
ctags.pattern: /^def create_access_token(subject: str, expires_delta: Optional[timedelta] = None, extra_claims: O/
ctags.signature: (subject: str, expires_delta: Optional[timedelta] = None, extra_claims: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None)
